parameters: This is where we control the transmitter.
I've only used it once, as we were leaving.
I hope I can message home, soon...
Had a feeling you two would be here…
What can I say? We’re excited to send a
Yeah we all are. Just let me…
Sort of. Something’s not… Say, can you two
Can you go over to the Engines, that’s
where the converters are, see if
Well yeah but… we’re not exactly
Just go and see if something seems off.
Like a blown fuse or sparks?
Yeah. Just don’t touch anything, you might
Oh, and I think I lost my keycard when
Come back later, I'm still finnicking
You sure you know how to do this?
Yeah, yeah, just give me a moment.
Let’s see. Tune it towards earth…
Looks like someone already tuned us to
Darn, looks we aren't tuned to Earth.
We need those lights on the wall to all
read green, try those switches down there.
I hardly know what to say to them
Uh yeah, this is Amia and Lira Zukunshoff.
This is probably going towards HQ first
I guess to you folks, please
send this over to our family.
We wanted to let you know that
Just a few more weeks, and we’ll be back
We’ve seen so much out on this expedition…
I don’t think I’ll ever be able to see
Sucks to be a future Lira suitor!
since I know you’re the one getting this,
I know you worry so easily,
but I hope it hasn’t been too bad.
Your sisters are fine! We’ll be back home
soon to give you all the love and hugs
I know you asked for a gift but…
Yeah, we’ll try to find some time though!
I know you asked for a gift,
so we’ve got one for you!
It’s the best darn gift you’ll ever get.
We won’t show it now though,
Right, Sal we don’t have much time left,
this transmission uses a crapton of power!
We love you alot, alright little brother?
I promise you there hasn’t been a day
we’ve been out here that we haven’t
We’ll be back soon. Goodbye for now, bro.
I’m sure he did. Let’s go back to sleep.
